DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research project compare effectiveness non-thrust mobilization exercise versus thrust manipulation dry needling patient sacroiliac dysfunction . Physical therapist commonly use approach treat sacroiliac joint dysfunction , study attempt determine one approach effective .
DOC.brief_title: Spinal Manipulation Dry Needling Versus Conventional Physical Therapy Patients With Sacroiliac Dysfunction
DOC.detailed_description: Patients sacroiliac pain randomized receive 1-2 treatment per week 6 week ( 10 session total ) either : 1 . High-velocity , low-amplitude ( HVLA ) thrust manipulation dry needle group , 2. conventional physical therapy ( Stabilization , force closure , motor control exercise manual therapy ) group .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patient must report sacroiliac dysfunction , define : Pain duration ( acute , subacute , chronic ) Fortin region ( pain may also project groin , thigh , low leg and/or foot ; however , may local Fortin region pain subject ) . Pain NOT centralize repeated movement sustain posture A minimum 3 positive pain provocation test use either Laslett et al . ( 2003 , 2005 ) van der Wurff et al ( 2006 ) multitest regiment : 3 follow 6 pain provocation test ( Laslett et al , 2003 , 2005 ) : Posterior thigh thrust Gaenslen 's test ( right ) Gaenslen 's test ( leave ) ASIS distraction ASIS compression Sacral compression 2 . A minimum pain rating 2/10 use NPRS ( Numeric Pain Rating Scale 0‚Äê10 ) 3 . A minimum ODI score 10/50 ( i.e . 20 % minimum Oswestry Disability Index ) 1 . Cauda Equina Syndrome 2 . Neurologic presentation consistent upper low motor neuron dysfunction due spinal involvement ( ie myelopathy nerve compression , hyperreflexia , pathologic reflex , depress absent reflex low extremity , motor weakness involve major muscle group low extremity , unsteady gait , diminish absent pin prick sensation legs and/or foot ) 3 . Spinal fracture 4 . Currently pregnant 5 . Coexisting medial problem / comorbidities ( e.g. , severe osteoporosis , tumor , inflammatory infectious condition , diabetes , angina , severe hypertension , RA , etc . ) 6 . Involvement litigation worker 's compensation claim low back 7 . Physical therapy chiropractic treatment low back pain 3 month initial examination 8 . Any indication might contraindicate spinal manipulative therapy . 9 . Recent surgery lumbar thoracic spine .
